original_title: Married People, Single Sex: Urban Adultery
overview: Everyone has desires. Meet six people who find that the joujrney into passion can lead in many directions: a couple whose relationship is challenged by a wild threesome, a woman trying to get her man to commit, a husband yearning for more from his wife. They must remember to be careful what they wish for.
title: Married People, Single Sex: Urban Adultery
